contents:
9 With Paramount Owning CBS, Trump Admin Signals Support for Them to Also Merge With Warner Bros (justthenews.com) posted 1 hour ago by TateDemarcus 3 comments award share report block With Paramount owning CBS, Trump admin signals support for them to also merge with Warner Bros. Warner executives are waiting for competing bids. Netflix, Comcast, and Amazon are among the potential bidders, reports say. Conservatives warn that a sale to Netflix or Comcast would further concentrate power in the media industry. justthenews.com
